summary: 2003 FOREST RIVER CEDAR CREEK WITH SEVERAL PROBLEMS. CONSUMER STATED THAT THE VEHICLE HAD SEVERAL PROBLEMS WITH LEAKAGE. THEY ALSO STATED THAT THE DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR HAD A RECALL ON IT AND THEY WERE NOT COVERED UNDER THE RECALL.  *KB    THERE WAS A FATIGUE CRACK IN THE BOILER TUBE AND GAS LEAKED OUT. THE CONSUMER STATED THE  UNIT WAS REPAIRED. DOMETIC MADE THE REPAIRS FREE OF CHARGE AS A FAVOR. THE CONSUMER LATER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE IN THE MAIL. DURING OWNERSHIP OF THE RV, A WRINKLE DEVELOPED ON THE BEDROOM WALL. *JB
